verses.kjv: And it came to pass in the twelfth year, in the twelfth month, in the first day of the month, that the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: In the twelfth year, in the twelfth month, in the first day of the month, “LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: On the 1st day of the 12th month, in the 12th year, the word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, take up a lamentation for Pharaoh king of Egypt, and say unto him, Thou art like a young lion of the nations, and thou art as a whale in the seas: and thou camest forth with thy rivers, and troubledst the waters with thy feet, and fouledst their rivers.
verses.web: ‘Son of man, take up a lamentation over Pharaoh king of Egypt, and tell him, “You were likened to a young lion of the nations; yet you are as a monster in the seas. You broke out with your rivers, and troubled the waters with your feet, and fouled their rivers.”
verses.ct: "Son of man, sing a funeral song for Pharaoh king of Egypt. Tell him: 'You thought of yourself as a young lion among the nations, but you are really a monster thrashing in the seas. You churned through your rivers, stirring up the waters with your feet and muddying every stream.'"

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will therefore spread out my net over thee with a company of many people; and they shall bring thee up in my net.
verses.web: The Lord LORD says: “I will spread out my net on you with a company of many peoples; and they will bring you up in my net.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: "I will throw my net over you, using a vast army of many nations, and they will haul you up in my net."

verses.kjv: Then will I leave thee upon the land, I will cast thee forth upon the open field, and will cause all the fowls of the heaven to remain upon thee, and I will fill the beasts of the whole earth with thee.
verses.web: I will leave you on the land. I will cast you out on the open field, and will cause all the birds of the sky to settle on you. I will satisfy the animals of the whole earth with you.
verses.ct: "I will toss you onto dry land, flinging you out in the open field. I will let every bird in the sky settle on you, and I will let the wild animals of the whole earth gorge themselves on your flesh."

verses.kjv: And I will lay thy flesh upon the mountains, and fill the valleys with thy height.
verses.web: I will lay your flesh on the mountains, and fill the valleys with your height.
verses.ct: "I will scatter your flesh across the mountains and fill the valleys with your remains."

verses.kjv: I will also water with thy blood the land wherein thou swimmest, even to the mountains; and the rivers shall be full of thee.
verses.web: I will also water the land in which you swim with your blood, even to the mountains. The watercourses will be full of you.
verses.ct: "I will drench the land where you swim with your blood, soaking it all the way to the mountains. The rivers will overflow with what's left of you."

verses.kjv: And when I shall put thee out, I will cover the heaven, and make the stars thereof dark; I will cover the sun with a cloud, and the moon shall not give her light.
verses.web: When I extinguish you, I will cover the heavens and make its stars dark. I will cover the sun with a cloud, and the moon won’t give its light.
verses.ct: "When I snuff you out, I will cover the heavens and darken the stars. I will hide the sun behind a cloud, and the moon will give no light."

verses.kjv: All the bright lights of heaven will I make dark over thee, and set darkness upon thy land, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: I will make all the bright lights of the sky dark over you, and set darkness on your land,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "I will make every bright light in the sky go dark above you and blanket your land in darkness," says the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: I will also vex the hearts of many people, when I shall bring thy destruction among the nations, into the countries which thou hast not known.
verses.web: “I will also trouble the hearts of many peoples, when I bring your destruction among the nations, into the countries which you have not known.
verses.ct: "I will trouble the hearts of many peoples when I bring news of your destruction to nations you've never even heard of."

verses.kjv: Yea, I will make many people amazed at thee, and their kings shall be horribly afraid for thee, when I shall brandish my sword before them; and they shall tremble at every moment, every man for his own life, in the day of thy fall.
verses.web: Yes, I will make many peoples amazed at you, and their kings will be horribly afraid for you, when I brandish my sword before them. They will tremble at every moment, every man for his own life, in the day of your fall.”
verses.ct: "I will leave many peoples stunned at what happened to you. Their kings will shudder in horror when I brandish my sword in front of them. On the day you fall, every one of them will tremble, fearing for their own lives."

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; The sword of the king of Babylon shall come upon thee.
verses.web: For the Lord LORD says: “The sword of the king of Babylon will come on you.
verses.ct: For this is what the Lord GOD says: "The sword of the king of Babylon is coming for you."

verses.kjv: By the swords of the mighty will I cause thy multitude to fall, the terrible of the nations, all of them: and they shall spoil the pomp of Egypt, and all the multitude thereof shall be destroyed.
verses.web: I will cause your multitude to fall by the swords of the mighty. They are all the ruthless of the nations. They will bring the pride of Egypt to nothing, and all its multitude will be destroyed.
verses.ct: "I will use the swords of mighty warriors to cut down your hordes — the most ruthless soldiers from every nation. They will shatter Egypt's pride, and all its masses will be wiped out."

verses.kjv: I will destroy also all the beasts thereof from beside the great waters; neither shall the foot of man trouble them any more, nor the hoofs of beasts trouble them.
verses.web: I will destroy also all its animals from beside many waters. The foot of man won’t trouble them any more, nor will the hoofs of animals trouble them.
verses.ct: "I will also destroy all its livestock from beside the great waters. No human foot will stir those waters again, and no animal's hoof will muddy them."

verses.kjv: Then will I make their waters deep, and cause their rivers to run like oil, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: Then I will make their waters clear, and cause their rivers to run like oil,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "Then I will let their waters settle and make their rivers flow smooth as oil," says the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: When I shall make the land of Egypt desolate, and the country shall be destitute of that whereof it was full, when I shall smite all them that dwell therein, then shall they know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: “When I make the land of Egypt desolate and waste, a land destitute of that of which it was full, when I strike all those who dwell therein, then they will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: "When I turn the land of Egypt into a wasteland, stripping it bare of everything that once filled it, and when I strike down everyone living there — then they will know that I am the LORD."

verses.kjv: This is the lamentation wherewith they shall lament her: the daughters of the nations shall lament her: they shall lament for her, even for Egypt, and for all her multitude, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “ ‘ “This is the lamentation with which they will lament. The daughters of the nations will lament with this. They will lament with it over Egypt, and over all her multitude,” says the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: "This is the funeral song they will sing over her. The women of the nations will sing it. They will mourn over Egypt and all her masses," says the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: It came to pass also in the twelfth year, in the fifteenth day of the month, that the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Also in the twelfth year, in the fifteenth day of the month, LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: On the 15th day of that same month, in the 12th year, the word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, wail for the multitude of Egypt, and cast them down, even her, and the daughters of the famous nations, unto the nether parts of the earth, with them that go down into the pit.
verses.web: “Son of man, wail for the multitude of Egypt, and cast them down, even her and the daughters of the famous nations, to the lower parts of the earth, with those who go down into the pit.
verses.ct: "Son of man, weep for the masses of Egypt. Send her down — her and the daughters of powerful nations — to the depths of the earth, alongside those who descend into the pit."

verses.kjv: Whom dost thou pass in beauty? go down, and be thou laid with the uncircumcised.
verses.web: Whom do you pass in beauty? Go down, and be laid with the uncircumcised.
verses.ct: "Who are you more beautiful than? Go down and take your place among the uncircumcised dead."

verses.kjv: They shall fall in the midst of them that are slain by the sword: she is delivered to the sword: draw her and all her multitudes.
verses.web: They will fall among those who are slain by the sword. She is delivered to the sword. Draw her away with all her multitudes.
verses.ct: "They will fall among those killed by the sword. The sword is ready for her — drag her away with all her hordes."

verses.kjv: The strong among the mighty shall speak to him out of the midst of hell with them that help him: they are gone down, they lie uncircumcised, slain by the sword.
verses.web: The strong among the mighty will speak to him out of the middle of Sheol with those who help him. They have gone down. The uncircumcised lie still, slain by the sword.
verses.ct: "The mightiest warriors will call out to Egypt from the depths of Sheol, along with her allies: 'They have come down! The uncircumcised lie here, killed by the sword.'"

verses.kjv: Asshur is there and all her company: his graves are about him: all of them slain, fallen by the sword:
verses.web: “Asshur is there with all her company. Her graves are all around her. All of them slain, fallen by the sword;
verses.ct: "Assyria is there with all her forces. Her graves surround her — every one of them killed, cut down by the sword."

verses.kjv: Whose graves are set in the sides of the pit, and her company is round about her grave: all of them slain, fallen by the sword, which caused terror in the land of the living.
verses.web: whose graves are set in the uttermost parts of the pit, and her company is around her grave; all of them slain, fallen by the sword, who caused terror in the land of the living.
verses.ct: "Their graves are set in the deepest parts of the pit, with her armies gathered around her tomb. All of them were killed by the sword — the same ones who once spread terror in the land of the living."

verses.kjv: There is Elam and all her multitude round about her grave, all of them slain, fallen by the sword, which are gone down uncircumcised into the nether parts of the earth, which caused their terror in the land of the living; yet have they borne their shame with them that go down to the pit.
verses.web: “There is Elam and all her multitude around her grave; all of them slain, fallen by the sword, who have gone down uncircumcised into the lower parts of the earth, who caused their terror in the land of the living, and have borne their shame with those who go down to the pit.
verses.ct: "Elam is there too, with all her hordes around her grave. All of them were killed by the sword. They went down uncircumcised to the depths of the earth — they who once spread terror in the land of the living. Now they carry their shame alongside everyone else in the pit."

verses.kjv: They have set her a bed in the midst of the slain with all her multitude: her graves are round about him: all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword: though their terror was caused in the land of the living, yet have they borne their shame with them that go down to the pit: he is put in the midst of them that be slain.
verses.web: They have set her a bed among the slain with all her multitude. Her graves are around her; all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword; for their terror was caused in the land of the living, and they have borne their shame with those who go down to the pit. He is put among those who are slain.
verses.ct: "A resting place has been made for her among the slain, surrounded by all her hordes. Their graves are all around her — every one of them uncircumcised, killed by the sword. Though they once spread terror in the land of the living, they now carry their shame with those who go down to the pit. She has been placed among the dead."

verses.kjv: There is Meshech, Tubal, and all her multitude: her graves are round about him: all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword, though they caused their terror in the land of the living.
verses.web: “There is Meshech, Tubal, and all their multitude. Their graves are around them, all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword; for they caused their terror in the land of the living.
verses.ct: "Meshech and Tubal are there with all their hordes, their graves surrounding them. All of them are uncircumcised, killed by the sword, because they once spread terror in the land of the living."

verses.kjv: And they shall not lie with the mighty that are fallen of the uncircumcised, which are gone down to hell with their weapons of war: and they have laid their swords under their heads, but their iniquities shall be upon their bones, though they were the terror of the mighty in the land of the living.
verses.web: They will not lie with the mighty who are fallen of the uncircumcised, who have gone down to Sheol with their weapons of war, and have laid their swords under their heads, and their iniquities are on their bones; for they were the terror of the mighty in the land of the living.
verses.ct: "But they don't lie in honor alongside the mighty fallen warriors of old, who went down to Sheol with their weapons of war, their swords placed under their heads. Instead, the guilt for their sins rests on their bones — even though they were the terror of the mighty in the land of the living."

verses.kjv: Yea, thou shalt be broken in the midst of the uncircumcised, and shalt lie with them that are slain with the sword.
verses.web: “But you will be broken among the uncircumcised, and will lie with those who are slain by the sword.
verses.ct: "And you, Pharaoh — you too will be shattered and laid among the uncircumcised, alongside those killed by the sword."

verses.kjv: There is Edom, her kings, and all her princes, which with their might are laid by them that were slain by the sword: they shall lie with the uncircumcised, and with them that go down to the pit.
verses.web: “There is Edom, her kings, and all her princes, who in their might are laid with those who are slain by the sword. They will lie with the uncircumcised, and with those who go down to the pit.
verses.ct: "Edom is there — her kings and all her princes. Despite their power, they are laid beside those killed by the sword. They lie with the uncircumcised, with those who have gone down to the pit."

verses.kjv: There be the princes of the north, all of them, and all the Zidonians, which are gone down with the slain; with their terror they are ashamed of their might; and they lie uncircumcised with them that be slain by the sword, and bear their shame with them that go down to the pit.
verses.web: “There are the princes of the north, all of them, and all the Sidonians, who have gone down with the slain. They are put to shame in the terror which they caused by their might. They lie uncircumcised with those who are slain by the sword, and bear their shame with those who go down to the pit.
verses.ct: "All the princes of the north are there, along with all the Sidonians. They went down with the slain, put to shame despite the terror their power once caused. They lie uncircumcised among those killed by the sword, carrying their disgrace with everyone else in the pit."

verses.kjv: Pharaoh shall see them, and shall be comforted over all his multitude, even Pharaoh and all his army slain by the sword, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “Pharaoh will see them, and will be comforted over all his multitude, even Pharaoh and all his army, slain by the sword,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "Pharaoh will see all of them and find a grim comfort that he's not alone — that his entire army met the same fate, killed by the sword," says the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: For I have caused my terror in the land of the living: and he shall be laid in the midst of the uncircumcised with them that are slain with the sword, even Pharaoh and all his multitude, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “For I have put his terror in the land of the living. He will be laid among the uncircumcised, with those who are slain by the sword, even Pharaoh and all his multitude,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "For I spread his terror throughout the land of the living. But now Pharaoh and all his hordes will be laid among the uncircumcised, alongside those killed by the sword," says the Lord GOD.
